org.springframework.data.redis.connection

接口 RedisHashCommands

  • 所有已知子接口:
    DefaultedRedisClusterConnection, DefaultedRedisConnection, RedisClusterConnection, RedisCommands, RedisConnection, StringRedisConnection
    所有已知实现类:
    org.springframework.data.redis.connection.AbstractRedisConnection, DefaultStringRedisConnection, JedisClusterConnection, JedisConnection, LettuceClusterConnection, LettuceConnection

    public interface RedisHashCommands
    Hash-specific commands supported by Redis.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Long hDel(byte[] key, byte[]... fields)
      Delete given hash fields.
      Boolean hExists(byte[] key, byte[] field)
      Determine if given hash field exists.
      byte[] hGet(byte[] key, byte[] field)
      Get value for given field from hash at key.
      Map<byte[],byte[]> hGetAll(byte[] key)
      Get entire hash stored at key.
      Double hIncrBy(byte[] key, byte[] field, double delta)
      Increment value of a hash field by the given delta.
      Long hIncrBy(byte[] key, byte[] field, long delta)
      Increment value of a hash field by the given delta.
      Set<byte[]> hKeys(byte[] key)
      Get key set (fields) of hash at key.
      Long hLen(byte[] key)
      Get size of hash at key.
      List<byte[]> hMGet(byte[] key, byte[]... fields)
      Get values for given fields from hash at key.
      void hMSet(byte[] key, Map<byte[],byte[]> hashes)
      Set multiple hash fields to multiple values using data provided in hashes
      Cursor<Map.Entry<byte[],byte[]>> hScan(byte[] key, ScanOptions options)
      Use a Cursor to iterate over entries in hash at key.
      Boolean hSet(byte[] key, byte[] field, byte[] value)
      Set the value of a hash field.
      Boolean hSetNX(byte[] key, byte[] field, byte[] value)
      Set the value of a hash field only if field does not exist.
      List<byte[]> hVals(byte[] key)
      Get entry set (values) of hash at field.

    • 方法详细资料

      • hSet

        @Nullable
Boolean hSet(byte[] key,
                       byte[] field,
                       byte[] value)
        Set the value of a hash field.
        参数:
        key - must not be null.
        field - must not be null.
        value - must not be null.
        返回:
        null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: HSET

      • hSetNX

        @Nullable
Boolean hSetNX(byte[] key,
                         byte[] field,
                         byte[] value)
        Set the value of a hash field only if field does not exist.
        参数:
        key - must not be null.
        field - must not be null.
        value - must not be null.
        返回:
        null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: HSETNX

      • hGet

        @Nullable
byte[] hGet(byte[] key,
                      byte[] field)
        Get value for given field from hash at key.
        参数:
        key - must not be null.
        field - must not be null.
        返回:
        null when key or field do not exists or when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: HGET

      • hMGet

        @Nullable
List<byte[]> hMGet(byte[] key,
                             byte[]... fields)
        Get values for given fields from hash at key.
        参数:
        key - must not be null.
        fields - must not be empty.
        返回:
        empty List if key or fields do not exists. null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: HMGET

      • hMSet

        void hMSet(byte[] key,
           Map<byte[],byte[]> hashes)
        Set multiple hash fields to multiple values using data provided in hashes
        参数:
        key - must not be null.
        hashes - must not be null.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: HMSET

      • hIncrBy

        @Nullable
Long hIncrBy(byte[] key,
                       byte[] field,
                       long delta)
        Increment value of a hash field by the given delta.
        参数:
        key - must not be null.
        field - must not be null.
        delta -
        返回:
        null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: HINCRBY

Double hIncrBy(byte[] key,
                         byte[] field,
                         double delta)
        Increment value of a hash field by the given delta.
        参数:
        key - must not be null.
        field - must not be null.
        delta -
        返回:
        null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: HINCRBYFLOAT

      • hExists

        @Nullable
Boolean hExists(byte[] key,
                          byte[] field)
        Determine if given hash field exists.
        参数:
        key - must not be null.
        field - must not be null.
        返回:
        null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: HEXISTS

      • hDel

        @Nullable
Long hDel(byte[] key,
                    byte[]... fields)
        Delete given hash fields.
        参数:
        key - must not be null.
        fields - must not be empty.
        返回:
        null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: HDEL

      • hLen

        @Nullable
Long hLen(byte[] key)
        Get size of hash at key.
        参数:
        key - must not be null.
        返回:
        null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: HLEN

      • hKeys

        @Nullable
Set<byte[]> hKeys(byte[] key)
        Get key set (fields) of hash at key.
        参数:
        key - must not be null.
        返回:
        null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: HKEYS?

      • hVals

        @Nullable
List<byte[]> hVals(byte[] key)
        Get entry set (values) of hash at field.
        参数:
        key - must not be null.
        返回:
        empty List if key does not exist. null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: HVALS

      • hGetAll

        @Nullable
Map<byte[],byte[]> hGetAll(byte[] key)
        Get entire hash stored at key.
        参数:
        key - must not be null.
        返回:
        empty Map if key does not exist or null when used in pipeline / transaction.
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: HGETALL

      • hScan

        Cursor<Map.Entry<byte[],byte[]>> hScan(byte[] key,
                                       ScanOptions options)
        Use a Cursor to iterate over entries in hash at key.
        参数:
        key - must not be null.
        options - must not be null.
        返回:
        从以下版本开始:
        1.4
        另请参阅:
        Redis Documentation: HSCAN
